member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the structure with zero values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.#ctor(Palette)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the structure using the given Palette.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.#ctor(float(&)[12])
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the structure using the given array of floats.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.#ctor(float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the structure using the given float for all values.
member.param: value to be set for all color values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.operator=(Palette)
member.summary: Performs structure assignment. Destination palette = source palette.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.operator==(Palette) const
member.summary: Check if two palettes are the same.
member.returns: Returns true if the palettes are the same; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.operator==(float(&)[12]) const
member.summary: Check if two palettes are the same.
member.param: The second palette represented by an array of 12 float values.
member.returns: Returns true if the palettes are the same; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.operator==(float) const
member.summary: Check if all values of the palette are equal to the given value.
member.returns: Returns true if all values of the palette are equal to the given value; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.operator!=(Palette) const
member.summary: Check if two palettes are not the same.
member.returns: Returns true if the palettes are not the same; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.operator!=(float(&)[]) const
member.summary: Check if two palettes are not the same.
member.param: The second palette represented by an array of 12 float values.
member.returns: Returns true if the palettes are not the same; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.operator!=(float) const
member.summary: Check if all values of the palette are not equal to the given value.
member.returns: Returns true if any value of the palette is not equal to the given value; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.clear(float)
member.summary: Sets all color values to the given value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Palette.copy(Palette)
member.summary: Copies all values from the given palette.
